expo.name: Gatsby and React Native Shared Code Proof of Concept
expo.description: This project is a proof of concept of the ability to share code between a Gatsby and Expo project using yarn workspaces. This concept is described in this article https://medium.com/viewstools/how-to-use-yarn-workspaces-with-create-react-app-and-create-react-native-app-expo-to-share-common-ea27bc4bad62
